Resource.item: Allows to create a personal generic activities list, not linked to any particular community. Activities will be visible only to the owner and the related resources.
Allows to create an activity list in a specific community. Activities will be visible only to owner and the associated resources but NOT to administrators.
Allows to create an activity list for community users. Activities will be visible to all associated resources. Only administrators can create this type of tasklist.
Allows to create an activity list for community users. Activities will be visible to all associated resources. Only administrators can create this type of tasklist.
Allows to create an activity list for community users. Activities will be visible to all associated resources. Only administrators can create this type of tasklist.
Allows to create a personal generic activities list, not linked to any particular community. Activities will be visible only to the owner and the related resources.
Allows to create a personal generic activities list, not linked to any particular community. Activities will be visible only to the owner and the related resources.
Allows to create an activity list for community users. Activities will be visible to all associated resources. Only administrators can create this type of tasklist.
Allows to create an activity list for community users. Activities will be visible to all associated resources. Only administrators can create this type of tasklist.
SELECT THE ACTIVITY LIST TYPE BY CLICKING "CHOOSE"
SELECT COMMUNITY IN WHICH YOU WANT TO CREATE AN ACTIVITY LIST
